movie.title: Blood from Stone
movie.description_intro: The old era of vampires has been forced into darkness, yet they are drawn to the dawning of a new era for themselves with a longing to be free of their savage curse.
movie.description_full: The old era of vampires has been forced into darkness, yet they are drawn to the dawning of a new era for themselves with a longing to be free of their savage curse.

movies.title: The Wicked One
movies.summary: A group of traveling friends who are hoping for a fun filled weekend getaway, find themselves in the cross hairs of one of the most dangerous and prolific serial killers in history.
movies.description_full: A group of traveling friends who are hoping for a fun filled weekend getaway, find themselves in the cross hairs of one of the most dangerous and prolific serial killers in history.
movies.synopsis: A group of traveling friends who are hoping for a fun filled weekend getaway, find themselves in the cross hairs of one of the most dangerous and prolific serial killers in history.

movies.title: Diane
movies.summary: Diane fills her days helping others and desperately attempting to bond with her drug-addicted son. As these pieces of her existence begin to fade, she finds herself confronting memories she'd sooner forget than face.
movies.description_full: Diane fills her days helping others and desperately attempting to bond with her drug-addicted son. As these pieces of her existence begin to fade, she finds herself confronting memories she'd sooner forget than face.

movies.title: Old Joy
movies.summary: Two old pals reunite for a camping trip in Oregon's Cascade Mountains.
movies.description_full: Two old pals reunite for a camping trip in Oregon's Cascade Mountains.
movies.synopsis: Two old pals reunite for a camping trip in Oregon's Cascade Mountains.

movies.title: Wild Daze
movies.summary: Wild Daze is a feature-length documentary following passionate people who work to save wildlife despite the numerous threats facing their survival including Africa's rampant, systemic corruption and crime. Filmed in 9 countries, Wild Daze was forged by a fierce desire to save the African wildlife, while also protecting its exploited women, children and forest peoples. An astonishing look at the complex threats which humans impose on Africa's vanishing wildlife, Wild Daze undeniably demonstrates how their loss affects the entire planet. Set in Sub-Saharan Africa, in her compelling documentary, Wild Daze, director and producer, Phyllis Stuart shares the unvarnished truth about the battle between human's desire to control nature and our need to save the wild.
